tool_description: Classifies incidents into standardized hazard categories using text analysis of incident descriptions and predefined safety taxonomies.

dataset_id.description: Identifier for the validated incident dataset

taxonomy_standard.description: Safety taxonomy to use: OSHA, ISO45001, or ANSI

include_subcategories.description: Whether to include detailed subcategories in classification

error_messages: Dataset not found: Ensure dataset_id refers to a valid incident dataset.
Unsupported taxonomy: Use OSHA, ISO45001, or ANSI taxonomy standards.
Invalid confidence threshold: Value must be between 0.0 and 1.0.
Too many custom keywords: Maximum 50 custom keywords allowed.
Classification failed: Unable to classify incidents due to insufficient text data.
usage: Provide dataset_id and taxonomy_standard. Adjust confidence_threshold for classification sensitivity. Enable include_subcategories for detailed categorization. Add custom_keywords for domain-specific terms.

category_distribution.description: Distribution of incidents across hazard categories

unclassified_count.description: Number of incidents that could not be classified
